name: Twitter Tagger Processor
description: Returns a subset of provided keywords that are found in a tweet, and a subset of provided users that are relevant to the tweet.

parameters.name: object_field
parameters.description: The name of the field in which the Twitter object is.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to be filtered for what can be found in the tweet.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: The users to be filtered for who is relevant to a tweet, for example as author, as mention, as retweeter, or as reply to that user.

parameters.name: exclude_on_none
parameters.description: Exclude tweets which do not match any filter.

parameters.name: combined
parameters.description: Combine the tags? If set to false, a map with keys keywords and users is added with all tags. If set to true, a list is returned.
